DOC.brief_summary: Randomised controlled trial of a lifestyle intervention programme for mothers and children aged 1-5 years aimed at prevention of overweight and obesity.
DOC.brief_title: Trim Tots Pre-school Obesity Prevention Programme
DOC.criteria: Children who are currently overweight/obese or at increased risk of becoming so and their mother or usual carer.
DOC.keyword: Prevention of overweight and obesity in pre-school children
